section_title: Key Strengths, Future Enhancements & Closing Statement

capabilities: Extracts six critical fields from diverse invoices
Operates within strict latency and cost limits
Generalizes beyond tractor quotations to any invoice type

future_enhancements.goal: Achieve sub-30s processing time at scale
planned_improvements: Avoid loading heavy deep models unless required

closing_statement.message: This solution demonstrates how intelligent document understanding can transform manual banking workflows into fully automated, reliable, and scalable pipelines.
